data.quote: Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth  within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love.
data.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

data.quote: Compare yourself with who you were yesterday, not with who someone else is today.
data.author: Jordan B. Peterson

data.quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: A man who procrastinates in his choosing will inevitabely have his choice made for him by circumstance.
data.author: Hunter S. Thompson

data.quote: Do not go gentle into that good night, Old age should burn and rave at close of day; Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
data.author: Dylan Thomas
